import React, { useState } from "react"; import { LiquidGlassCard, LiquidGlassCardContent, LiquidGlassCardDescription, LiquidGlassCardHeader, LiquidGlassCardTitle } from "../components/ui/liquid-glass-card"; import { LiquidGlassButton } from "../components/ui/liquid-glass-button"; import { AppleRevealText, BikeBearText } from "../components/BikeBearAnimations"; import { FadeIn, ScaleIn, StaggerContainer, StaggerItem } from "../components/ScrollAnimations"; import { Badge } from "../components/ui/badge"; import { Tabs, TabsContent, TabsList, TabsTrigger } from "../components/ui/tabs"; import { CheckCircle, Monitor, HardDrive, Cpu, ShieldCheck, Phone } from "lucide-react"; import { products } from "../mock/data"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Products = () => { const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState("all"); const categories = [{ id: "all", label: "All Products", icon: }, { id: "Hardware", label: "Hardware", icon: }, { id: "Software", label: "Software", icon: }]; const filteredProducts = selectedCategory === "all" ? products : products.filter(product => product.category === selectedCategory); const getSubcategoryIcon = (subcategory) => { const icons = { "Laptops": , "Desktops": , "Components": , "Operating Systems": }; return icons[subcategory] || ; }; const getCategoryColor = (category) => { const colors = { "Hardware": "bg-blue-100 text-blue-800", "Software": "bg-green-100 text-green-800" }; return colors[category] || "bg-gray-100 text-gray-800"; }; return (

); }; export default Products;
